content:
{"name": "Friendship Missionary Baptist Church Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* Located on COTA line 10.
* Closed the first Tuesday and first Saturday of each month
* Closed on the Tuesday following a major Monday Holiday
* Schedule by calling 211 or TEXT to 614-702-7772 with first and last name, current address, phone number and date they would like to visit. 
* Clients may also register through the RSVP at FreshTrak.com.  
* Serves 43204, 43215, 43222, 43223, 43228, 43119. ", "email": "", "url": "https://www.friendshipohio.org/home", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1775 West Broad Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Hilltop", "state_province": "OH", "postal_code": "43223", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.9553462, "longitude": -83.04563979999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(614) 279-0008", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Wear Facemask"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
